price: Sesungguhnya orang-orang kafir dan mereka mati dalam keadaan kafir, mereka itu mendapat laknat Allah, para Malaikat, dan manusia seluruhnya.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٌ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū wamātū wahum kuffārun ulāika ʿalayhim laʿnatu al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
